name: World XZ
description:
Welcome to an indie games demo that is still in development. At the moment this game has been worked on for something like 2 weeks so don't expect something special but do know that I poured most of that time working on it as best as I could.

The full game will be released when it's finished as expected but also when I'm happy with the amount of polished content that it might have.

In this game, you Follow Ray in his quest to find justice for the loss of his loved mother who was killed in an attack that destroyed his entire village.
